title: Persevering Through Uncertainty - Coronavirus and Small Business
description:
It's officially SHE's 100th episode! And there’s a lot of fear surrounding the economy and what it means for household income and small businesses…

But while the rest of the world is running around like their hair is on fire, selling out the toilet paper and Costco shelves, wondering how their bills or team is going to get paid, unsure of whether or not to launch what they had planned, and freeeeaking out on what to do next…

We’re gonna take a deep breath and handle this craziness like the cool, calm, and collected women we know how to be.

Look, this is a really weird time. So, in this episode Jordan

1. Shares the research she's done on important economic predictions to be aware of as you make decisions

2. Tackles your biggest questions regarding navigating this current situation as a small business ("is it insensitive to keep marketing?" etc.)

3. Provides the kick in the pants we all need to face this adversity with class, dignity, strength, and courage.

Find more at jordanleedooley.com or follow on Instagram: @jordanleedooley


Referenced resources:
Great Legal Resources for Service Providers: @thelegalpaigeUSA Today Article: http://bit.ly/33qgeZD
Investopedia: http://bit.ly/2UdYegVForbes Article: http://bit.ly/2x2G1eg
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
